name: Maya Shah
title: AI Developer
objective: Driven to find practical solutions to complex problems, I focus on identifying inefficiencies and creating automated systems to address them. I take pride in learning quickly and applying new knowledge effectively to develop well-thought-out, efficient outcomes.
description_front_page: Hey, I’m Maya—an AI engineer, developer, and all-around problem solver. I love blending creativity with tech, whether it’s coding, building web apps, designing AI-powered solutions, or just figuring out a smart jugaari fix (if you know, you know). Right now, AI is my playground—I see it as more than just hardcore tech; it’s a tool for innovation, design, and making ideas come to life. But I don’t stop there. I also have a strong background in graphic design, website building, and electronics engineering, which means I’ve built some pretty cool prototypes along the way. If you’re facing a tech challenge—data, AI, automation, or just an idea waiting to be built—let’s talk. I specialize in turning complex problems into scalable, real-world solutions that actually work. Check out my projects to see how I bring AI to life, or hit me up if you want to brainstorm over coffee (virtual or real).  Always happy to share ideas—no charge, just good vibes.
